price: Ɛna asԑm bͻne anaa kasa bͻne nso mfatoho tesε dua bͻne a atutu ama nenhini no wͻ asaase no ani, na enni nyinasoͻ pa biara.
arabic: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
